title: Ranked position issue
body: i have played a series of ranked game during the past few days, around 20 games and i only gotten my primary role ( jungle) like 5 times. i am failing to understand as in why this is happening to me and i now request a clear explanation to why this problem is occurring

replies.body:
This is a pretty good example of [Negativity Bias](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Negativity_bias) at work. 

You said that in your last 20 ranked games you only got jungle 5 times. Well I checked the last 20 ranked games you played, and you actually got jungle 12 times. You were playing as jungle 60% of the time, yet it **felt** like you were getting jungle 25% of the time. 

According to the Negativity Bias theory, this happened because you remember the negative experience of not playing jungle far more clearly than the positive experience of getting to playing jungle.
Whoa..... I love this answer it opened my mind! I always knew that there was something like this but never knew what it was tanks mate!
